info.name: wire.app.com (Wire messenger) Carbon Blue
info.description: Carbon Blue theme for Wire messenger's browser app @ app.wire.com.
info.additionalInfo:
Based on Carbon Blue global style:
https://userstyles.org/styles/91347/carbon-blue

A variation on this theme with x-small font is available here:
https://userstyles.org/styles/137918/wire-app-com-wire-messenger-carbon-x-small-font
